reviewText: Awesome footage even though kind of grainy. Great for old footage!!! Brings back memories. Surfing industry owes big time to two of the icons of the sport!!! Bustin down the door movie explains the beginnings of pro surfing in the world. We and all surfers of the world OWE the surfers in bustin down the door a BIG THANK YOU !!!

First see the 2008 documentary Bustin' Down the Door then learn about Mark Richards and Shaun  Tomson, two of the four men responsible for turning a ne'er do well pastime of surfing into a respected, professional sport and a multi-billion dollar industry.
